runs.comm: slightly full outside off and it's driven nicely into the covers, it beats cover and then Mahmudullah tries to stop from wide mid-off with his left leg, but misses and then chases and dives again near the boundary but it goes for four
full and angling in, he defends to mid on
drives another full delivery straight to cover
tries to pull from just outside off but the ball doesn't bounce as much and goes off his waist to off side. It was a slower one too
takes a step down first ball and flicks to deep midwicket for one
gets an inside edge onto his pads off the back foot for the back of length ball and they sneak in a single

wicket first ball as Mushy takes a sharp catch to his left and up goes the finger! It was not quite full outside off but Raza drove away from the body and the ball nipped in after pitching to take the inside edge and Mushy grabbed it with both hands
Williams bowled first ball! It was another short of length ball headed for the stumps and Williams barely moved his feet to push at it, missed it and that hit the stumps
draws a thick outside edge which falls short of gully before rolling away to third man
Chakabva leans forward and leaves it outside off
length delivery outside off with no room, solid defence
touch fuller outside off, still no room and defends with a straight bat again
fullish outside off and it's pushed to short cover
drives outside off and is beaten
fuller outside off it's pushed to cover again
fullish around off and it's whipped with the wrists to leg for two
back of length on leg and it's worked to short fine leg for one more
shortish outside off and Chakabva works it to leg for a quick single
comes down to slam the fullish delivery straight down and finds mid off, but gets one
makes room, slogs, and misses the back of length ball as it goes just over the stumps
pretty full now on off, Ervine pushes it down with a straight bat and gets one to mid off
pretty high full toss on off, he defends it to cover. Was just around waist height I think
shuffles to the off side, Al Amin pitches it well outside off and he defends into the covers
falls in no man's land! Chakabva miscued that shot by coming down the track and lofted it a little high but not too far, and mid off and cover could not get there
nearly strikes first ball as Chakabva pushes the ball back, the ball had some extra bounce and it lobbed up towards the bowler but fell just short
he strikes second ball, not an issue! Chakabva made room for the fullish delivery, heaved and got an edge that went high on the off side and point went back a few steps to take that nicely
towards off stump from length and he defends solidly
tries a yorker but falls a bit short and Ervine flicks it very well and late, fine to fine leg for one
angles it across outside the off stump, Jongwe defends it
edged and that falls short of first slip! Fuller this time, making Jongwe drive and he got a thick outside edge that bounced once before slip and went to third man
length delivery outside off and he defends it back
fuller on the stumps and it's driven down to long on for one
dances down to take the ball on the full and dispatches the it from middle and leg over the long on boundary for a clean six! Breaks the shackles, Ervine
on the pads now and he helps it towards short fine leg for one
inside edge onto the pads as the back of length ball is on the stumps but he can't put it away
beaten this time by the short of length ball outside off as he swings and misses
starts on the pads and Ervine helps it to square leg for one
comes down and defends the ball back to the bowler
much shorter and angling in, he can't clear midwicket
comes down and makes it a full toss now, drives it to long off for one
stumping missed! Ervine came down and was cramped for room as it turned it, but Mushfiqur missed it too as it went to his right and for four byes
defends the flat and turning ball on off side
shortish from outside leg and it's punched to long on
slower through the air as Ervine sweeps but takes it on the pad
much shorter outside off, he swats it to deep square leg now

horrible mix up, Ervine is run out! Jongwe drove the flatter delivery into the covers and Ervine wanted a single which may not have existed as the fielder got to the ball in no time, and he was caught yards outside because he could not come back in time
flat and wide outside off, gets an inside edge to short third man who fumbles to concede a single
comes forward and defends the ball back
comes out of the crease to work the ball to leg but takes it on the body
just wide of cover for four! He came down again, got the ball outside off and drove that uppishly and firmly into the covers, just wide of the diving fielder
uses his feet again and drives to long on for one

Zimbabwe crumbling here as the captain holes out to long off! uses his feet again and drives it down to long off! Facing only his second ball, he comes down the track and mistimes the lofted shot down the ground. Mahmudullah at long-off only has to take a few steps in and catch it easily
outside off and he defends it to point
shorter on middle, he goes back and works it to leg
shortish and flat outside off, he cuts it late to deep third man and comes back for two
bowls it pretty slow on middle and leg, he goes back and tucks it to midwicket
full outside off and it's steered behind square for one
turning in a bit from middle and Jongwe takes a run after defending it in the gap on off
cuts this one off the back foot from outside off to third man for two more
bit too short and Waller slams it over midwicket for six! He rocked on the back foot and pulled it even though there was a deep midwicket, who jumped but couldn't get to it
comes down and drives to long off easily
goes deep in the crease and whips the ball uppishly to deep midwicket for one
well outside off and Jongwe shuffles across to paddle sweep it fine on leg
falls just short of long off! It was shortish outside off, Waller went back and slammed it flat and hard over the covers but it landed before wide long off
fuller now on the stumps and it's clipped to wide long on for two as they come back quickly
flat and quick on the stumps, he pulls and finds deep midwicket
bowls his cutter from back of length outside off, Jongwe cuts and misses

loud appeal for caught behind as Mushu dives forward and takes it cleanly but the umpire shakes his head. It was a slower cutter outside off, Jongwe poked his bat out and the ball nearly brushed his bat. Replays show that probably took his right thumb, actually
thick edge flies off the bat this time as the ball has extra bounce and goes where first slip would have been, to third man for one
Waller also can't connect as the ball cuts across him
much wider outside off and he lets it go this time
goes back and across to cover the line and defends it close to himself even though he wanted to whip it to leg
nearly another run out as Jongwe's edge goes to the covers and they scamper along for a single. Had the fielder hit the stumps at bowler's end, Jongwe was gone
comes down and slams the ball to long off by taking it on the full
makes room but the ball comes in with the angle and he works it towards deep midwicket
comes out of the crease and slams it down to long on for one
comes out again, Sunny bowls it slower, and it goes off the pads to square leg for a leg bye
pitched up on leg, had flight too and Waller got enough time to slog that over the midwicket boundary for his second six!
flattish on the stumps and it's struck back to long off for one
slog-sweeps the flat ball with the turn to deep midwicket for one
outside off and it's cut off the back foot to deep cover. Mahmudullah dives once to keep it in, and then gets up and dives again to keep the ball from sliding towards the boundary again
too full, Waller picks the length and hammers that to the long-on boundary. There was a fielder there who jumped near the rope but it went just over him
flatter outside off, he swings and misses
well outside off, Waller tries to cut by moving across and misses and that was probably a wide but not called

that's gone high, will it be taken...no falls just short! Jongwe went for a slog and the ball went very high on the leg side. Nasir ran in from deep midwicket and dived forward but it landed before him
no ball for overstepping, Jongwe drives straight to cover
right in the block hole and he digs it out to long on. Sabbir Rahman also gets a direct hit at bowler's end but Waller was safely in
slow offcutter on short of length outside off, he swings wildly and misses
pretty straight and he swats it to leg for one
full and slower ball on off, Waller chips it softly in the air to midwicket but there's nobody there
run-out chance? Jongwe strikes the ball back to long on and it didn't go that fast so they come back for the second and Mushy takes the bails off but Jongwe puts in a dive to make it
shortish outside off, Waller slices it uppishly to third man for one
full and quick outside off, Jongwe swings and misses

shortish and angling in, Jongwe pulled without getting on top of the ball and top edged it to leg. Kayes had to run back a bit from square leg to take that nicely with both hands. Crucial stand comes to an end and it's Al-Amin again
short and wide, Waller waits for it and slams it to the backward point boundary, right in the gap for four
defends the back of length ball towards backward point for one
beaten outside off as Madziva pokes for the ball and misses
small appeal for caught behind as Waller pokes at the fullish offcutter and misses. That was really close
much shorter now, and they appeal again, also stifled, as Waller is beaten outside off again after shuffling across to off a little
full toss down the leg side as Waller goes across again, and Mushy does well to dive and get a hand to it. A wide and bye (so two wides) for Zimbabwe
he comes down the track to get bat on it but the angle beats him!
fuller outside off, Madziva tried to get close to it and swung his bat but missed again! Top bowling from Mustafizur
keeps a bit low as Madziva pokes outside off and misses again
slow and low full toss on the stumps, Madziva pushes it down to mid on and takes a run. Bangladesh won't mind that
back of length outside off, he charges down, and swings and misses!
that was a slow legcutter from Al-Amin, he pitched it on back of length. Madziva played for the angle and was beaten after the ball moved away
angling in towards leg and Madziva goes down on a knee to slog that behind square for a four. That will ease some nerves but the RRR is still 12
comes down and slices this one from well outside off, and up and over backward point, right in the gap for four more!
on length outside off, he slams it back to long off for one
dabs the ball from outside off to point for a single to keep strike
he bowls one towards middle and leg, Waller hardly moves and scoops that over short fine leg for four on first ball!
well outside off now, Waller shuffles across and steers it to backward point for one
almost in the block hole just outside off, Madziva swings and misses

he gets bat this time, but it's an edge and Mushfiqur has taken it! Full again outside off, Madziva wanted to slog that to the leg side but got an edge. Oh, they are checking for the no ball and it's very close! The third umpire needs more replays and looks like when the foot lands completely, there's nothing behind the crease. But was there anything behind when the heel lands? The third umpire says it's a no ball, is that a twist? Madziva stays and gets a free hit too!
bowls the cutter well outside off, Madziva plomps his front foot outside leg, heaves and misses again
touch closer to off stump, from back of length and Madziva pokes and misses again
charges down this time to slog the ball, it angles away and he misses it yet again
oh, Waller holes out! It was flat outside off, he went for a big swipe to smash it to leg but didn't get the distance and was taken easily at long on. There goes Waller, and Zimbabwe's hopes
oh my, that's a drive over the covers for six! It was flattish outside off, Madziva came down and slammed that inside out to send it all the way!
doesn't quite middle it as he pulls the ball back down the ground, to long off for two
that's four more! It was full and wide, Madziva went deep in the crease and swung his bat, got a very thick edge that flew to the vacant third man area for four

tonked! High and handsome, Madziva has absolutely hammered that straight down the ground, it's gone very very high and lands well over the boundary for a clean and big six. Madziva throws his bat (literally) away in celebration and gets hugs from his team-mates!
